showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:37}); // [Save Point]
Access the Menu and select
{PURPLE}[SAVE]{WHITE} to save your game.

dialogStrings: Cargo Ship

“Yes sir!
Everything quiet, sir!”

{Tifa}
“…But, you know what?
I really hate this uniform.”{PAUSE}“Uniforms, soldiers, war,
I hate 'em all.”{PAUSE}“They take away all the things
and people you love…”{PAUSE}“I wish they'd all disappear.
Right, {Cloud}?
{CHOICE}Yeah…
{CHOICE}I don't know

{Tifa}
“You're right!”

{Tifa}
“Uh, yes sir, I'll continue my watch sir!
Hee hee…”

{Tifa}
“…{Cloud}.
Wearing those clothes seems to have
changed you a little.”{PAUSE}“Does it remind you of being in SOLDIER?
I hope not…”

“Hey!
What's wrong, kid?
You got no pep!”{PAUSE}“A seaman's gotta have umph!”
{CHOICE}I'm tired…
{CHOICE}Something's missing
{CHOICE}Leave me alone

“Say, who are you?
You're not a part of the crew.”{PAUSE}“Oh well, seamen never bother
with details!”{PAUSE}“How you feelin'!”
{CHOICE}I'm tired…
{CHOICE}Something's missing
{CHOICE}Leave me alone

“Ey ey!
Whattaya mean, 'missin'!?”

“I got just the perfect thing!
'Invisible Alpha'--
A super drink for seamen!!”{PAUSE}“Just one'll rejuvenate you!
Only 250 gil!”
{CHOICE}I'll take it
{CHOICE}No thanks

“Thanks!
This is a necessity for a sailor.”{PAUSE}“This is a must item for a sailor!
Ha ha ha !”

“Thanks!
Now let's get on with it!“ {PAUSE}“This is the only real ecstasy
you can get on this ship!
Ha ha ha!”
HP/MP Restored!

“Hey!
Seamen shouldn't be so stingy!”

“President Rufus and his men are in
the Bridge of the Ship. If they see you
slacking, they'll bust you one!”

“…{OK}
…It's me. {OK}
{Red XIII}.”

{Red XIII}
“I'm a little woozy, but
I shouldn't get caught.”{PAUSE}“Humans only look at appearances
anyway.”{PAUSE}“Anyway you look at it,
I'd say I make a fine human being.”

{Red XIII}
“It's pretty hard standing
on two feet…”

“Oh man, we're almost to Costa del Sol.”{PAUSE}“When I get there, I'm going to take
a long overdue vacation. Maybe
I'll go down to the beach and get a tan…”

“Hey!
You don't have enough money!”

{Barret}
“You all right!?”

{Tifa}
“Everyone all right!?”

{Aeris}
“Huh?”

{Barret}
“Hey, wait.”{PAUSE}“You don't think that suspicious
stowaway is…”

{Tifa}
“Everyone's here…right?”
“Sephiroth!?”

{Tifa}
“Really!?”

{Barret}
“How the hell am I supposed to know!?”

{Cloud}
“…Let's find out.”

{Red XIII}
“It's the most logical thing to do.
Then, who's going to go?”

{Yuffie}
“N, not me…”{PAUSE}“I don't even like Sephiroth anyway.
And besid…ugh…urk…”

{Cloud}
“…
Sephiroth…”{PAUSE}“…All right, let's go!”

{Barret}
“I'm goin' too!”

{Aeris}
“Is it really
Sephiroth…?”

{Tifa}
“Take me with you!”

{Red XIII}
“These clothes are too tight on me.
Can I switch with you?”

{Yuffie}
“I told you…I don't want…
to, ugh…urk…”
